Textoffset: Using Evade
Try tapping evade or flicking the screen to evade foe attacks!
Switching Auto Modes
Tap the Auto button in the top right corner of the screen for manual to full auto play!
Using Auto Modes
Use Semi Auto to automatically attack foes and use Full Auto to automatically advance and attack!
Using Autoventure
You can use Autoventure for cleared quests! Use it to auto play through quests multiple times!
Getting EXP
EXP earned after clearing a quest will be added to all allies in your party. The amount earned doesn't vary by number of allies.
Co-op Quests
Co-op is displayed for some quests' ideal party power. Teaming up with other players is recommended for these high level battles!
AP (Adventure Points)
Spend AP to play main & event quests. AP is restored by 1 point every 5 minutes.
SP (Special Points)
Spend SP to play training quests. SP is restored by 1 point every 5 minutes.
Using Elements Wisely
Check elemental weaknesses from the quest details or foe icons in battle. Allies don't have elemental weaknesses.
Weapon Types: Axe
Tap and hold Attack to fill the ST gauge when wielding axe weapons!
Weapon Types: Boomerang
Boomerangs are great for distance attacks! Piercing through enemy clusters, you can aim for many foes in one throw!
Weapon Types: Bow
Bows can be used to attack foes from a great distance!
Weapon Types: Staff and Flail
Staffs and flails are weapons of magic. Their normal attacks both fill the ST gauge and restore MP!
Weapon Types: Glove and Knife
Glove and knife weapons are great for multiattacks and racking up combos!
Weapon Types: Polearm
Use polearms to attack foes while keeping your distance and automatically attack targets just by stepping forward!
Weapon Types: Sword
Swords are easy to wield with a good balance of multiattacks, range, and power! Swords also gain the wielder a Super Armor skill!
Super Armor (SA)
Use Super Armor to dodge attacks and be immune to knock-backs!
Ascending Allies
You can ascend allies of any rarity to the highest rarity through training!
Ascend Material
You can ascend allies of any rarity to the highest rarity through training!
High-Level Quests: Tower
Twillwool Tower is a high-level quest where a boss awaits you every 10 floors!
High-Level Quests: Spell Shards
Get spell shards obtained from Twillwool Tower to trade for even better items!
Character Bonds
Clearing battles earns bond EXP for characters in your party. Earn a set amount to raise bond levels!
Bond Levels
Bond level stats are tied to characters, so allies of the same character will share bond levels regardless of rarity or element.
Bond Level Rewards
You can get rewards for leveling up characters bonds! Earn a set amount of bond EXP to raise bond levels!
Home Screen
You can stroll around your home screen to speak to characters and visit different spots around the town!
Home Screen Characters
Characters will appear randomly on your home screen based on which allies you've acquired.
Co-Op Battles
Team up with other players to take on quests! Tap Co-op from the Home screen to play!
Player Sharing in Co-op Battles
Mega Spirit Magic gauges and combos can be shared between players!
Moon and Wood Mana Board Materials
You can't get materials for moon and wood mana boards from item drops. So be sure to check the traders to get the items you need!
Getting Powerful Gear
Play gear drop dungeons to get even more powerful gear and easily sweep through co-op battles!
Gear: Main Stat
All gear comes with a main stat. Level up the gear to boost its main stat!
Gear: Bonus Stats
Gear can gain bonus stats at certain levels, and these stats increase at random!
Forming Strategies
Check "Change Strategy" on the Ally Details screen to change actions for allies you don't control. (Strategy settings cannot be changed during battle.)
Using Co-op Chat
Use Chat to send stickers and preset phrases to communicate with players in co-op rooms. You can even send stickers during battle!
Mega Spirit Magic
Mega Spirit Magic power varies by its Mega Spirit Magic level and the STR & INT of the ally using it.
Selling Gear
Sell gear to get lucre and gear upgrade material! Material gained varies by level and rarity of the gear sold.
Settings Screen
Use Settings to customize game and battle settings, stamina recovery notifications, and more!
Weapons
You can change weapons for any ally from the Ally Details screen!
Memory Gems
Equip memory gems to boost stats, gain aegis skills, and boost mega spirit magic levels!
Upgrading Memory Gems
Don't forget to level up and unleash your memory gems for party stats boosts!
Equipping Items for Battle
You can equip up to 3 types of items to each of your parties! The item type and number you can equip varies by quest.
Extra Quests
Extra quests are added to cleared main quest chapters! Multiple playthroughs are perfect for toughening up your party! (There are no extra quests for Chapter 1 normal difficulty.)
Weapon Attack Types
Weapons attacks have different types such as slash, piercing, blunt, and magic attacks!
